hero_desc: A scalable, government-grade solution for managing hierarchy, attendance, and field tracking. Designed for Collectors, District Admins, and Field Officers.
features_desc: Built for the Odisha Government ecosystem, supporting complex hierarchies and strict geospatial enforcement.
f1d: Define precise Circular, Rectangular, or Polygon boundaries.
f2d: Strict role management: Collector → District Admin → Block Admin.
f3d: Real-time GPS tracking for field officers with battery monitoring.
f4d: Device binding (IMEI/UUID) and GPS Mock location detection.
f5d: Automated daily logs and anomaly alerts for Admins.
